version_description:
We are bringing you two main features in this version：
1. Today Widget is supported with which you can switch VPN much more easily
2. UDP forward is also supported which is widely used in online games
Fix SSR udp relay bug
1. Fix a severe bug (For specific SS/SSR servers, connections for some websites cannot be established)

1. Smart Routing is added! Smart Routing can improve network experience by redirecting only websites that are outside China to your proxy. It costs less proxy data and can speed up domestic network traffic.
2. Fixed: Unable to import proxy with uri str
1. Bug fixes and performance improvements

1. Add support for auto-detecting country flags;
2. Bug fixes and performance improvements;
Fix smart routing issue
iPhone X support
Add support for Shadowsocks SIP002 uri scheme
Fixed unable to add proxy with port 65535
Bug fixes and performance improvements

This version brings you with multiple improvements:
1. Brand-new design of network core which is faster and more robust. We need more feedback from you since it still hasn't been broadly tested;
2. Simplified Today Widget which also support showing
Revert to previous version due to some serious bugs

With this update, we're bringing you some exciting new features, enhancements and bug fixes.

## New Features

- New VPN Core to improve performance and stability (Beta)
- Custom DNS is supported now
- Introduce new design of onboarding
